msg: Removed top bar link to the Confluence generated page for new feature list; the link is still available in the Documentation page; the Confluence page is still a very valuable tool, especially for building release branch specific "what's new" documents (that we could bundle in the release).

author: chirino
msg: Fix for APLO-245: The LevelDB store does not seem to get cleaned/compacted
Posting to '/virtual-hosts/{id}/store/action/compact' will now compact the store.
